description: These face marks all use a φ for a hand holding some kind of writing implement like a pen or pencil. It looks like the round part of this character is their hand while the straight line is the writing tool. This is definitely one of my favourite. It is like the pencil has gotten really, really short and they are trying to use it for their writing until the very end.  ＿φ( °-°)/ φ（．．） φ(￣￢￣ヾ) ＿φ(°-°=) φ(￣ー￣ )ノ φ(●ﾟ益ﾟ)っ φ(．．;) φ(°ρ°*)メ φ(´ω｀●) φ(^∇^ ) φ(^ω^*)ﾉ φ(ﾟ ωﾟ//）♡ φ(◎◎ヘ) …φ(o´ωﾟo)φ… _φ(●ﾟ益ﾟ)っ ＿φ(￣ー￣ ) σ(ൈ)φ φ(´д｀ｏ) ＿φ(□□ヘ) (๑╹o╹)φ ≡≡≡≡φ(＾∇＾*) (‘•̀ ▽ •́ )φ φ|o-Дゞo| φ(･c_,･｡) φ(・ω・｀ ) ((φ(．．｡) φ(ﾟｪﾟ♡) φ(._.) “φʕ•ᴥ•oʔ …..φ(・∀・＊) _φ［・ω・｀*］ φ(-｀Д´-*) …..φ(〃∇〃 ） …..φ(-ω-｡`) …..φ(〃∇〃 ))) φ(´ω｀= ) φ( =´∀｀)ﾉ ..φ(ｰ￣*) _φ(*￣0￣)ﾉ …φ(ω￣*) _φ(*￣ω￣)ﾉ [＼／]…..φ(・д・。)
